message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because my inflation rate is higher (20% vs your 10%), so the money devalues faster for me. If we go to another round, both of us will lose value, but I'll lose more. This offer maximizes our combined value.
Hi Alice, let's aim for a fair split of 50-50. This way, we share equally without further devaluation impacting our gains. I hope this works for you.
